body: Operating Hours & Seasons              Reno Valley fight and river crossing.   Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument is open year round. However, the National Monument is closed on the following holidays: Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day.   Little Bighorn Battlefield National Monument Seasonal Hours.
